Source.Name: python-discid
Source.Description: Python-discid implements Python bindings for MusicBrainz Libdiscid. Libdiscid's main purpose is the calculation of an identifier of audio discs (disc ID) to use for the MusicBrainz database. That identifier is calculated from the TOC of the disc, similar to the freeDB CDDB identifier. Libdiscid can calculate MusicBrainz disc IDs and freeDB disc IDs. Additionally the MCN of the disc and ISRCs from the tracks can be extracted.

Package.Name: python-discid
